titles.title: Save Every Child Using Restraints Act of 2004
To require combination 3-point safety belts on all school buses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: 10/5/2004--Introduced. Save Every Child Using Restraints Act of 2004 - Directs the Secretary of Transportation to prescribe regulations establishing a safety standard requiring that all school buses with a gross vehicle weight of more than 10,000 pounds be equipped with three-point safety belts on all seats.
